com.ace.lewissketch
Class Scalable

java.lang.Object
  com.ace.lewissketch.Scalable
All Implemented Interfaces:
LsConstants
 class Scalable
extends Object
implements LsConstants

Scales a Molecule object so that coordinates are in range. Usually used on data imported from a MOL file.

getNumAtoms

int getNumAtoms()
Gets the number of atoms in the molecule.

Returns:
the number of atoms in the molecule

scale

void scale(boolean autoCenter)
Scales coordinates of atoms to fit in applet boundaries, if necessary. The order of the three scaling subroutines is important, to ensure figure fits on the drawing screen (the most important factor). Enlarging may make the figure too big, so shrinking is done after enlarging, ensuring the figure size "fits". Moving last ensures an assumed-small-enough figure is within window coordinates.

Parameters:
autoCenter - whether to center the molecule

scale

void scale(double[] min,
           double[] max,
           boolean autoCenter)
Scales coordinates of atoms to fit in applet boundaries, if necessary. The order of the three scaling subroutines is important, to ensure figure fits on the drawing screen (the most important factor). Enlarging may make the figure too big, so shrinking is done after enlarging, ensuring the figure size "fits". Moving last ensures an assumed-small-enough figure is within window coordinates.

Parameters:
min - the minimum coordinates of where to place the atoms
max - the maximum coordinates of where to place the atoms
autoCenter - whether to center the molecule

scale

private void scale(MinMax canvasMinMax,
                   boolean autoCenter)
Scales coordinates of atoms to fit in applet boundaries, if necessary. The order of the three scaling subroutines is important, to ensure figure fits on the drawing screen (the most important factor). Enlarging may make the figure too big, so shrinking is done after enlarging, ensuring the figure size "fits". Moving last ensures an assumed-small-enough figure is within window coordinates.

Parameters:
canvasMinMax - the boundaries of where the atoms should be placed
autoCenter - whether to center the molecule

scaleMove

void scaleMove(MinMax figureMinMax,
               MinMax canvasMinMax,
               boolean autoCenter)
Moves figure to center of window, ensuring figure remains in window area, and modifies figure min/max. If autocenter is false and figure already fits in window, nothing is done.

Parameters:
figureMinMax - boundaries of the figure
canvasMinMax - boundaries of the canvas
autoCenter - whether to center the figure

center

void center()
Moves figure to center of window, ensuring figure remains in window area, and modifies figure min/max.

flip

void flip()
Flips the image of the molecule.

reflectY

void reflectY(double aboutY)
Reflects (flips) the molecule across the line specified by the given Y value. This is needed because LewisSketch and Java use "Y direction is down" while MOL and MRV files use "Y direction is up".
NOTE: it is possible reflection will place atoms outside the viewing area. Translation may be required after reflection.

Parameters:
aboutY - Y-coordinate of the line of reflection

reflectY

void reflectY(double aboutY,
              boolean forMView)
Reflects (flips) the molecule across the line specified by the given Y value. This is needed because LewisSketch and Java use "Y direction is down" while MOL and MRV files use "Y direction is up".
NOTE: it is possible reflection will place atoms outside the viewing area. Translation may be required after reflection.

Parameters:
aboutY - Y-coordinate of the line of reflection
forMView - whether this drawing will be displayed in MarvinView; if so, disallowed charge octants may be different

redistAllAtomOctants

void redistAllAtomOctants()
Forces all atoms in molecule to redistribute their lone electrons and charge. Invoked after "mass move" of atoms.

redistAllAtomOctants

void redistAllAtomOctants(boolean forMView)
Forces all atoms in molecule to redistribute their lone electrons and charge. Invoked after "mass move" of atoms.

Parameters:
forMView - whether this drawing will be displayed in MarvinView; if so, disallowed charge octants may be different

redistAllAtomOctants

void redistAllAtomOctants(double scaleFactor)
Forces all atoms in molecule to redistribute their lone electrons and charge. Invoked after "mass move" of atoms.

Parameters:
scaleFactor - how far away from the atom to place the electrons

redistAllAtomOctants

void redistAllAtomOctants(double scaleFactor,
                          boolean forMView)
Forces all atoms in molecule to redistribute their lone electrons and charge. Invoked after "mass move" of atoms.

Parameters:
scaleFactor - how far away from the atom to place the electrons
forMView - whether this drawing will be displayed in MarvinView; if so, disallowed charge octants may be different
